member.name: T:TemplateFoundation.Plugins.ScriptManagerPlugin
member.summary:
This plugin ensures that the EpiServer edit panel has a script manager. It is needed for multi-properties to not call a post-back when its buttons are pushed.
Code taken from http://tedgustaf.com/en/blog/2010/8/use-updatepanel-inside-an-episerver-custom-property/
